name: mega-bracelet
effect: Allows the player’s Pokémon to Mega Evolve.
short_effect: Allows the player’s Pokémon to Mega Evolve.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This cuff contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to Mega Evolve in battle.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This cuff contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to Mega Evolve in battle.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This cuff contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to Mega Evolve in battle.
